member.name: T:CDBNETXAML.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:CDBNETXAML.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:CDBNETXAML.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:CDBNETXAML.My.Resources.Resources.CSHIcon
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: T:CDBNETXAML.RelayCommand`2
member.summary: A command whose sole purpose is to relay its functionality to other objects by invoking delegates. The default return value for the CanExecute method is 'true'.

member.name: M:CDBNETXAML.ExplorerViewOptionAttribute.GetOption(CDBNETXAML.ExplorerViewOptions,System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the Option if it is set on the Type, otherwise returns ExplorerViewOptions.Undefined

member.name: M:CDBNETXAML.RGBToHSLConverter.Convert(System.Windows.Media.Color,System.Single@,System.Single@,System.Single@)
member.summary: Converts a color from RGB to HSL and returns the values in out-parameters
member.param: If the function succeeds, this parameter will be initialised with the color's hue

member.name: T:CDBNETXAML.MatchFunction
member.summary: When a match rank for an item is calculated, all the functions below are evaluated. A total is made up of all the values and this is used to order the items The number of items specified by the developer is then displayed to the user
